name: From The Holes
description:
This game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020. The theme was Holes. Me and my two friend finished this game in one week. You can rate my game from Jam page : )

Our game  is a kind of survival game. You need to survive 1 minute when the random holes start appearing. There is two different holes. The blue ones firing bullets and the orange ones firing rockets.  For now there is only 3 level. If the game gets good feedback, I will make more. So dont forget to  give feedback. (Sorry for bad English)
